data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during FOX cruise from Trincomale to Bombay started at 1803-09-07

Ship: Fox (5th Rate Frigate), Voyage: Trincomale - Bombay, 1st Observer: James Vashon (Captain), 2nd Observer: William Flint (1st Officer/Master), Company: Royal Navy, Other ship information: 32G 698BM
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
